name: Road to the Champ
description:
Made for Indie Game Maker Contest 2018.

A wrestling themed RPG mixing timing based attacks and the awareness that wrestling is obviously not real. Work together with your partners in the ring to put on the best show possible! Outside the ring improve your body and personality on the road to becoming a top performer!

Controls (Controller required)
Directional pad - move
A(Xbox)/X(PS): Confirm, Open Menu, Time Attack
B(Xbox)/O(PS): Cancel

Press F to toggle fullscreen.
Press Esc to quit.

This is more proof of concept than a game with any victory of loss conditions. Just play around and enjoy yourself!

Sound/Music
Money Can't Buy - mvrasseli
Battle Theme III - Pugly
Bell sound - Benboncan
